fields.name: u1g5d0ogq5
fields.label: Slack Channel
fields.description: To use Slack Channel, add a Slack Webhook URL.

fields.name: u1gl45qgge
fields.label: Subject
fields.description:
To add dynamic subject, use jinja tags like 
{{ doc.name }} Delivered

fields.name: u1g8j0duuu
fields.label: Send Alert On
fields.options:
New
Save
Submit
Cancel
Days After
Days Before
Minutes After
Minutes Before
Value Change
Method
Custom

fields.name: u1g2aki6gu
fields.label: Trigger Method
fields.description: Trigger on valid methods like "before_insert", "after_update", etc (will depend on the DocType selected)

fields.name: u1guihp4ok
fields.label: Reference Date
fields.description: Send alert if date matches this field's value

fields.name: u1ggvnmc70
fields.label: Reference Datetime
fields.description: Send alert if datetime matches this field's value

fields.name: u1g00bcjla
fields.label: Days Before or After
fields.description: Send days before or after the reference date

fields.name: u1gef5lm17
fields.label: Minutes Offset
fields.description: Send at the earliest this number of minutes before or after the reference datetime. The actual sending may be delayed by up to 5 minutes due to the scheduler's trigger cadence.

fields.name: u1gtokqivu
fields.label: Value Changed
fields.description: Send alert if this field's value changes

fields.name: u1gaoaadif
fields.label: Send System Notification
fields.description: If enabled, the notification will show up in the notifications dropdown on the top right corner of the navigation bar.

fields.name: u1g47ce0ca
fields.label: Condition
fields.description: Optional: The alert will be sent if this expression is true

fields.name: u1g63urv2n
fields.label: Message Examples
fields.options:
Message Example
<h3>Order Overdue</h3>

<p>Transaction {{ doc.name }} has exceeded Due Date. Please take necessary action.</p>

<!-- show last comment -->
{% if comments %}
Last comment: {{ comments[-1].comment }} by {{ comments[-1].by }}
{% endif %}

<h4>Details</h4>

<ul>
<li>Customer: {{ doc.customer }}
<li>Amount: {{ doc.grand_total }}
</ul>
